text:
Winter Has Finally Arrived! Fans Welcome Game Of Thrones Season 8 With Epic Jokes & Memes
Winter Has Finally Arrived! Fans Welcome Game Of Thrones Season 8 With Epic Jokes & Memes
After what felt like eternity -- 595 Days to be precise, winter has finally arrived. One billion people tuned into HBO to watch the first episode of Game Of Thrones season 8. All the fans across the globe, including Indians who watched it on Hotstar, forgot their Monday blue and woke up at 6:30 am eager to watch the finale season, and boy, it was one heck of an episode, tbh.
With so many wow moments and so many twists, in just about an hour, episode one of Game Of Thrones season eight hooked the entire world. It has set the stage for a wild ride to finale. It is the beginning of THE end.
(Warning: The following contains spoilers for the Season 8. If you haven’t watched the first episode of season 1, don’t scroll down.)
From Stark sibling reunion to Jaime Lannister arriving at Winterfell, from Jon Snow finding out who he really is to his romance with Daenerys Targaryen, it was an overloaded of emotional high and lows.
Don't Miss 159 SHARES 842 SHARES
Here’s how Twitter reacted to the first episode of Game Of Thrones with excitement, roasts and jokes!
#1
Sansa, throwing shade at Khaleesi:
"What do dragons eat anyway?"
Khaleesi, breaker of chains, the First of Her Name, The Unburnt, Sipper of Tea, and Blocker of Shade:
"Whatever they want."
ADVANTAGE: Khaleesi. #GameOfThrones pic.twitter.com/a0O8FsX3aD — BrooklynDad_Defiant! (@mmpadellan) April 15, 2019
#2
#3
I still can't get over Bran. You gotta be some kind of petty to sit outside all night waiting for the dude that tried to kill you. #GameofThones #DemThrones — Krystal, not Kay (@KSpenceMedia) April 15, 2019
#4
#5
Bran at the end of the episode of #GameofThrones: I’m waiting for an old friend
Me: pic.twitter.com/pykD6JNiWh — Cassi (@MyThoughtsLit) April 15, 2019
#6
Bran watching Jaime Lannister ride into Winterfell #GameofThrones pic.twitter.com/6cqAj6o1eN — blinkorshrink (@Blinkorshrink) April 15, 2019
#7
Kids watching their mom kiss a dude they don’t like #GameofThrones pic.twitter.com/tlyeZUiOcO — Peter Tran (@thedunklistt) April 15, 2019
#8
Cersei thought the Golden Company was bringing elephants? On boats?! #GameofThrones pic.twitter.com/cYPjsatsoH — Dee. (@D_TwoSeven) April 15, 2019
#9
#10
#11
Bran got 3 eyes and they’re all on Jamie Lannister #GameOfThrones pic.twitter.com/kZwZL5g5zL — Kayin (@KayinPepper) April 15, 2019
#12
dany: lol jon u know i'm gonna have your sister burned alive if she doesn't bend the knee in like [checks watch] the next 5 min right
also dany: jon why doesn't your sister like meeee — Angie J. Han (@ajhan) April 15, 2019
#13
Jon: wow it’s so exciting to see my family after being separated for years!
Bran: yeah but the wall collapsed and we’re all going to die.#GameOfThrones pic.twitter.com/Q3YpKO6ncR — Mr. Steal Your Wifi (@TheGorester) April 15, 2019
#14
#15
me realising i'll have to wait another 7 days for another #gameofthrones episode pic.twitter.com/oQ3D7LtrSI — dany (@millionyengirls) April 15, 2019
But just remember, “if you think this has a happy ending, you haven't been paying attention.” Can't wait for episode two!
title: Winter Has Finally Arrived! Fans Welcome Game Of Thrones Season 8 With Epic Jokes & Memes
description: After what felt like eternity -- 595 Days – when winter finally arrived, one billion people tuned into HBO to watch the first episode of Game Of Thrones season 8. All the fans across the globe, including Indians who watched it on Hotstar, were waiting in excitement, and boy, that was one heck of an episode, tbh.
